CustomField.description: Previous name was "YTD achievement of target %" (MW0003520).
CustomField.formula: IF( Current_Year__c, IF((YTD_Actual_Amount__c /Total_Original_Budget__c) * 100 > 500, '>500%', IF((YTD_Actual_Amount__c /Total_Original_Budget__c) * 100 < -500, '<-500%', TEXT(ROUND(YTD_Actual_Amount__c /Total_Original_Budget__c * 100, 0)) & '%')), null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: YTD billed revenue for the current month divided by the current financial year Target amount and displayed as a percentage. This will display the percentage of revenue achieved towards Target to date within the current financial year.
CustomField.label: YTD Planned vs Traded
